COVID-19 Data Explorer: The share of COVID-19 tests that are positive
column3: The number of confirmed cases divided by the number of tests, expressed as a percentage. Tests may refer to the number of tests performed or the number of people tested – depending on which is reported by the particular country.

column3: Shown is the rolling 7-day average. The number of confirmed cases divided by the number of tests, expressed as a percentage. Tests may refer to the number of tests performed or the number of people tested – depending on which is reported by the particular country.

COVID-19 Data Explorer: Case fatality rate of the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic
column3: The Case Fatality Rate (CFR) is the ratio between confirmed deaths and confirmed cases. During an outbreak of a pandemic the CFR is a poor measure of the mortality risk of the disease. We explain this in detail at OurWorldInData.org/Coronavirus

COVID-19 Data Explorer: Excess mortality during COVID-19: The number of deaths from all causes compared to previous years, all ages
column3: Shown is how the number of weekly deaths in 2020 differs (as a percentage) from the average number of deaths in the same week over the previous five years (2015–2019). This metric is called the P-score. We do not show data from the most recent weeks because it is incomplete due to delays in death reporting.

column3: Shown is how the number of weekly deaths in 2020 differs (as a percentage) from the average number of deaths in the same week over the previous five years (2015–2019). COVID-19 Data Explorer: Retail and recreation: How did the number of visitors change since the beginning of the pandemic?
column3: Change in visitor numbers is measured relative to a baseline day; a baseline day is the median value from the 5‑week period between Jan 3rd and Feb 6th 2020. This index is smoothed to the rolling 7-day average.

column3: Change in visitor numbers is measured relative to a baseline day; a baseline day is the median value from the 5‑week period between Jan 3rd and Feb 6th 2020. This index is smoothed to the rolling 7-day average.

column3: Share of respondents who said they had been in contact with a symptomatic person before developing symptoms.

COVID-19 Data Explorer: Share who said they self-isolated after developing COVID-19 symptoms
column3: Share of respondents who said they self-isolated for seven days after developing symptoms.

column3: Share of respondents who said they visited a doctor or healthcare setting in the last week after developing symptoms.

COVID-19 Data Explorer: Share who said they were willing to isolate if they developed COVID-19 symptoms
column3: Share of respondents who said they would self-isolate in the next seven days if they developed symptoms.

COVID-19 Data Explorer: Share who said they would have difficulty self-isolating for 7 days if advised
column3: Share of respondents who said it would be difficult to self-isolate for seven days if advised to do so by a healthcare professional or public health authority.

COVID-19 Data Explorer: Share who said they were willing to isolate if advised by a healthcare professional or authority
column3: Share of respondents who said they would self-isolate in the next seven days if advised to do so by a healthcare professional or public health authority.

COVID-19 Data Explorer: Share who wear a face mask
column3: Share of respondents who said they wear a face mask outside their home (e.g. when on public transport, going to a supermarket, going to a main road).

COVID-19 Data Explorer: Share who were frequently washing their hands with soap and water
column3: Share of respondents who said they 'Always' or 'Frequently' took steps to wash their hands with soap and water in the last seven days to protect themselves or others.

COVID-19 Data Explorer: Share who were frequently using hand sanitiser
column3: Share of respondents who said they 'Always' or 'Frequently' covered their nose and mouth when sneezing or coughing in the last seven days to protect themselves or others.

COVID-19 Data Explorer: Share who said they were avoiding contact with symptomatic people
column3: Share of respondents who said they 'Always' or 'Frequently' took steps to avoid contact with symptomatic people in the last seven days to protect themselves or others.

COVID-19 Data Explorer: Share who said they were avoiding going out
column3: Share of respondents who said they 'Always' or 'Frequently' avoided going out in the last seven days to protect themselves or others.

column3: Share of respondents who said they 'Always' or 'Frequently' avoided going to healthcare settings in the last seven days to protect themselves or others.

column3: Share of respondents who said they 'Always' or 'Frequently' avoided using public transport in the last seven days to protect themselves or others.

COVID-19 Data Explorer: Share who said they avoided working outside their home
column3: Share of respondents who said they 'Always' or 'Frequently' avoided working outside the home in the last seven days to protect themselves or others.

COVID-19 Data Explorer: Share who said they avoided sending children to school or university
column3: Share of respondents who said they 'Always' or 'Frequently' avoided letting their children go to school or university in the last seven days to protect themselves or others.

column3: Share of respondents who said they were happier than two weeks ago.

column3: Share of respondents who said they 'Always' or 'Frequently' wear a face mask inside their home.

column3: Share of respondents who said they 'Always' or 'Frequently' wear a face mask inside a grocery store/supermarket.

column3: Share of respondents who said they 'Always' or 'Frequently' wear a face mask at work.

column3: Share of respondents who said they 'Always' or 'Frequently' wear a face mask on public transport.
